name: Robot Ultimate Laser Explosion
description:
In a world that has been taken over by robots, humanity's last hope is... you.

R.U.L.E. is a 2.5d retro action game that is heavily inspired by by the classic arcade cabinet game Robotron 2084. Fight waves of robots to get the highest score, or team up with a friend and save humanity together!

This game has been made as a student project by the amazing Frozen Duck Games!
